sense.def:
A limit
je največja možna ali dovoljena količina ali obseg ali najvišja možna ali dovoljena stopnja nečesa.

seg.quote: There is no limit to the risks they are prepared to take.
The powers of the human brain are stretched to the limit.

sense.def:
The limits of a situation
so dejavniki v določenih okoliščinah, ki omogočajo samo nekatera dejanja ali posledice.

seg.quote: ...the problems of applying that system within the limits of a weekly, two-hour meeting.

sense.def:
To limit something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi nekaj postalo večje od določene količine ali stopnje.

seg.quote: Japanese exports would be limited to 1.68m vehicles.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
limits someone
ali kadar nekdo
limits oneself
, je število stvari, ki jih tista oseba ima ali stori, omejeno.

seg.quote: Why should the people of this country limit me that way?
Will he limit himself to seeing that the enterprise is approved?
Many of these customs were narrow and limiting.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
limited to a particular place or group of people
, obstaja samo v določenem kraju ali tisto ima ali počne samo določena skupina.

seg.quote: This problem is not limited to Sweden.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki kraj
off limits
, ni dovoljeno iti tja.
